content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Processing Line at (-2.0, -76.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position -2.0, -76.0) connected to
- Stone furnace (position -1.0, -74.0)

### Copper Ore Processing Line at (-21.0, -73.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position -21.0, -73.0)
- Iron chest (position -21.5, -74.5) containing copper ore
- Burner inserter (position -20.5, -74.5) moving items from chest to furnace
- Stone furnace (position -19.0, -74.0) with copper plates

### Iron Plate Distribution System around (1.5, -74.5)
Complex system consisting of:
- Iron chest (position 1.5, -74.5) containing iron plates
- Burner inserter (position 0.5, -74.5) feeding into the chest
- Connected belt system running from y=-74.5 to y=-69.5
- Multiple iron chests along the belt:
  - At position (0.5, -72.5)
  - At position (3.5, -71.5)
  - At position (7.5, -72.5) containing iron plates
- Multiple burner inserters:
  - At position (1.5, -72.5)
  - At position (3.5, -74.5)
  - At position (5.5, -74.5)
  - At position (6.5, -72.5)
- Additional stone furnaces:
  - At position (3.0, -73.0)
  - At position (5.0, -73.0)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities in occupied spaces
- Before placing an iron chest or any entity, check if the target position is already occupied by another entity or item
- Use the entity inspection functions to verify if a position is free before attempting to place anything

### Errors when inspecting inventory at positions
- Inventory inspection can only be done on entities that have inventory capability
- Cannot inspect inventory of a Position object directly
- First verify if there is an entity at the position and then inspect its inventory
